description: Erection of a hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension and installation of 2x front roof lights to facilitate the loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.
RBK Design Officer is satisfied with the information provided and recommends that Condition 4, Part 19 can be discharged.
Please provide an Existing Elevational plan

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:The largest of the 4 tree removals are those at the rear of the property and not visible to the public, those at the front are small trees not contributing greatly to public amenity and certainly not worthy of a TPO in order to prevent their removal.Recommendation:No objections.
